title: Don Parkinson
text:
Don Parkinson is a New Zealand former <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who represented <a href="New%20Zealand%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">New Zealand</a> in 1968.
Playing career.
From <a href="Huntly%2C%20New%20Zealand">Huntly</a>, Parkinson played for the <a href="Taniwharau%20Rugby%20League%20Club">Taniwharau Rugby League Club</a> and represented <a href="Waikato%20rugby%20league%20team">Waikato</a>. A hooker, Parkinson represented <a href="New%20Zealand%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">the Kiwis</a> in 1968.
Later years.
In 2005 Parkinson was fined and sentenced to 400 hours' community work after he had mistakenly shot another hunter while out deer hunting.
